comments:
The EMF project wizard will fail if the source is specified as a valid Ecore 
model in a project that has a space in its name. The wizard repeatedly prompts 
to specify a valid Ecore model when in fact an exception has actually occurred.

Here is a stack trace:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.ui 2 0 2005-02-14 11:29:49.277
!MESSAGE Path must include project and resource name: /Foo
!STACK 0
